body_html: @alrojo: One thing about the maximum_length, I was wondering we should remove this line maximum_length = array_ops.constant(maximum_length, dtype=dtype) in the decoder_fn_interference? The reason is users might want to have the maximum_length determined at run time, e.g., twice as long as the maximum encoder lengths tf.round(2 * tf.reduce_max(encoder_lengths)).

body: @alrojo: One thing about the `maximum_length`, I was wondering we should remove this line `maximum_length = array_ops.constant(maximum_length, dtype=dtype)` in the `decoder_fn_interference`? The reason is users might want to have the maximum_length determined at run time, e.g., twice as long as the maximum encoder lengths `tf.round(2 * tf.reduce_max(encoder_lengths))`.
